affinity.affinityDescription: Choose hotels based on your interests and preferences to share unique experiences with like-minded people.
affinity.howardSchultzQuote: When you're surrounded by people who share a passionate commitment around a common purpose, anything is possible

slogans.notJustStay: It's not just a stay. It's a shared world
slogans.stayWithThoseWhoGetYou: Stay with those who get you
slogans.tiredOfRandom: Tired of random? Choose your people
slogans.stayAndConnect: Stay and connect through what you love
